SKU Naming Convention (Chuáº©n hÃ³a mÃ£ SKU)
Format chuáº©n cho shop thá»i trangâ€‹
[BRAND]-[CATEGORY]-[COLOR]-[SIZE]

VÃ­ dá»¥:
DEV-SM-W-M
â””â”¬â”˜ â””â”¬â”˜ â””â”¬ â””â”¬
 â”‚   â”‚   â”‚  â””â”€ Size: M
 â”‚   â”‚   â””â”€â”€â”€â”€ Color: W (White/Tráº¯ng)
 â”‚   â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ Category: SM (SÆ¡ Mi)
 â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ Brand: DEV (Devenir)

Báº£ng mÃ£ hÃ³a chuáº©n:
Brand codes:

DEV = Devenir Collection

(Má»Ÿ rá»™ng cho brands khÃ¡c)

Category codes:â€‹

SM = Ão SÆ¡ Mi

TH = Ão Thun

PO = Ão Polo

QT = Quáº§n TÃ¢y

QJ = Quáº§n Jean

AK = Ão KhoÃ¡c

Color codes:â€‹

W = White (Tráº¯ng)

B = Black (Äen)

N = Navy (Xanh Navy)

GR = Gray (XÃ¡m)

BL = Blue (Xanh DÆ°Æ¡ng)

BG = Beige (Be)

BR = Brown (NÃ¢u)

Size codes:

S, M, L, XL, XXL, XXXL

(Giá»¯ nguyÃªn)

Auto-generate SKU Logic
// Function tá»± Ä‘á»™ng táº¡o SKU
function generateSKU(product, variant) {
  const brand = product.brand.code; // "DEV"
  const category = product.category.code; // "SM"
  const color = variant.color.code; // "W"
  const size = variant.size; // "M"
  
  return `${brand}-${category}-${color}-${size}`;
  // Output: "DEV-SM-W-M"
}

Best Practices TÃ³m táº¯t
